entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Winnipeg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 p.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Blowing snow in open areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
